postId.description: The temporary ID of the post provided in the input.

subCategory.description: A more specific sub-category, if applicable.

keywords.description: List of 3-5 keywords from the post.

summary.description: A brief 1-2 sentence summary of the post's core message related to its category.

isPotentialIdea.description: True if the post explicitly or implicitly suggests a project/thesis idea.

reasoning.description: Brief justification for the assigned category.
